response.overview: Maya and Abby are sisters trying to make their complicated living situation work. Maya, the older and more reserved sister, keeps to herself, quietly navigating lifeâ€™s challenges. Abby, on the other hand, is loud, impulsive, and often drunk, making their shared apartment a constant battleground. As they clash over everything from habits to values, their relationship is tested. Will these polar opposites ever find common ground, or will their differences drive them further apart?
response.tagline: Nobody Knows You Like Your Sister
response.title: School Nights
